prompts: Create a playful electric-type Pokemon that resembles a small dog with fluffy ears and a wagging tail.
I want a cute Pokemon design that combines yellow and brown colors, showcasing a joyful expression.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that has a round body shape and is known for its friendly demeanor.
Make a chubby electric-type Pokemon with distinctive features like a fluffy collar and bright eyes.
Imagine a Pokemon that loves to play in urban areas, featuring a mix of yellow and brown tones.
Design a small, energetic Pokemon that embodies the spirit of companionship and loyalty.
Show me a Pokemon with a vibrant color palette and endearing traits that make it a beloved companion.
